mapper.insert: insert into review (reviewno, userid, content, star, reviewimg, placeid) values(#{reviewno}, #{userid}, #{content}, #{star}, #{reviewimg}, #{placeid})
mapper.update: update review set modifydate=#{modifydate}, content=#{content} where reviewno=${reviewno} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from review where reviewno=#{param1} and userid=#{param2}
